basics.name: Yuan Guo
basics.summary: Junior undergraduate in Computer Science at Shanghai Jiao Tong University, looking for Ph.D. programs. Research interests in LLMs & AI agents.

work.name: Langboat Technology
work.summary: Remote applied scientist intern focusing on language model agents.
highlights: Studied topics on Computer-Using Agents including long-horizonal compositional tasks and personalization under the supervision of Prof Ming Zhou (ACL Fellow)
Involved in building agentic systems for enterprise clients
Hosted multiple tech salons, prepared 2 patents (1 already issued) and wrote several tech blogs

work.name: AI Security Lab, SJTU
work.summary: Research on autonomous GUI agent and agent safety under Prof Zhuosheng Zhang.
highlights: Studied topics about autonomous GUI agent, agent safety etc

skills.name: LLM
keywords: Experience in LLM/ML alignment, evaluation, GUI agent

publications.name: Atomic-to-Compositional Generalization for Mobile Agents with A New Benchmark and Scheduling System
publications.authors: Yuan Guo, Thomas Miao, Zheng Wu, Peizhou Cheng, Ming Zhou, Zhuosheng Zhang
publications.summary: Introduced a comprehensive benchmark UI-NEXUS for mobile agents on compositional tasks and proposed a scheduling system for atomic-to-compositional generalization for existing mobile (computer-using) agents.

publications.name: EVA: Red-Teaming GUI Agents via Evolving Indirect Prompt Injection
publications.authors: Yue Li, Tianle Ju, Manman Zhao, Xinrui Ma, Yuan Guo, Zhuosheng Zhang
publications.summary: We propose EVA, a red-teaming framework for indirect prompt injection which transforms the attack into a closed-loop optimization by continuously monitoring an agent's attention distribution over the GUI and updating adversarial cues—keywords, phrasing, and layout—in response.

publications.name: Universal Confidence Integration Framework for Adaptive Interaction in Computer-Using Agents
publications.authors: Zheng Wu, Peizhou Cheng, Zongru Wu, Yuan Guo, Gongshen Liu, Zhuosheng Zhang
publications.summary: A framework for blending agents for adaptive, human-in-the-loop human-agent-device co-interaction. PAMI submission.

publications.name: Plan, Generate and Match: Scientific Workflow Recommendation with Large Language Models
publications.authors: Yang Gu, Jian Cao, Yuan Guo, Shirou Qian, Wei Guan
publications.summary: We propose 'Plan, Generate and Match' (PGM), a scientific workflow recommendation method leveraging LLMs. PGM consists of three stages: utilizing LLMs for planning by generating a user query, generating a structured workflow specification from Solution Steps, and using these plans and specifications to match with candidate workflows.

publications.name: BeHonest: Benchmarking Honesty of Large Language Models
publications.authors: Steffi Chern, Zhulin Hu, Yuqing Yang, Ethan Chern, Yuan Guo, Jiahe Jin, Binjie Wang, Pengfei Liu
publications.summary: In this paper, we introduce BeHonest, a pioneering benchmark specifically designed to assess honesty in LLMs comprehensively. BeHonest evaluates three essential aspects of honesty: awareness of knowledge boundaries, avoidance of deceit, and consistency of responses.

patents.title: 针对GUI智能体的模型构建方法、程序产品及存储介质
patents.summary: A personalization technology for MLLM-powered GUI agents.
